overview.title: GroupDocs.Conversion at a glance
overview.description: Explore the capabilities of the Conversion API for swift and flawless conversion of PDF, Microsoft Office, HTML, eBook, and Image files within .NET applications

feature_1.title: Streamlined Conversion
feature_1.description: Incorporate effortless file conversion into your C# projects using GroupDocs.Conversion for .NET. Seamlessly transition between formats for improved compatibility.

feature_2.title: Flexible Integration
feature_2.description: Simplify the integration of PDF and Office file conversion. GroupDocs.Conversion for .NET enhances the versatility of your applications.

feature_3.title: Cross-platform Compatibility
feature_3.description: Run conversions on Windows, Linux, and macOS platforms to cater to a broader user base.
